original_sentence: i purchased this (1: item) 7 months ago and i love it .
translated_sentence: 我 7 个月前购买了这个（1 件商品），我很喜欢它。

original_sentence: absolutly horrible (1: product) , cheap (2: components) make for unreliable (1: product)s , but when the nearest (4: service location) is 50 + miles away i wonder how much (5: apple) truly cares ?
translated_sentence: 绝对糟糕产品，廉价组件导致不可靠产品，但是当最近的服务地点距离 50 多英里时，我想知道苹果真正关心多少？

original_sentence: i got a replacement (1: unit) and it had the same issue .
translated_sentence: 我得到了一个替代品（1 个单位），但问题仍然相同。

original_sentence: for $ 250 i can control my $ 3000 (1: pc) anywhere .
translated_sentence: 只需花费 250 美元，我便可以在任何地方控制我的 3000 美元（1 台电脑）。

original_sentence: their (1: designs) are made for phones and on this huge screen , they are palpitated .
translated_sentence: 他们的设计是为手机而设计的，在这个巨大的屏幕上，他们心潮澎湃。

original_sentence: one of the two (2: usb ports) is defective , which is an enormous pain .
translated_sentence: 两个（2 个 USB 端口）中有一个有缺陷，这真是太麻烦了。

original_sentence: the (1: trackpad) is awful as are most acer (1: trackpad)s .
translated_sentence: 触控板 和大多数宏碁 触控板 一样糟糕。

original_sentence: i am beyond impressed with this little (1: machine) , i would absolutly buy this again !
translated_sentence: 我对这台小机器印象深刻，我绝对会再次购买它！

original_sentence: i have had three (1: macbook pro ' s) and all have been excellent .
translated_sentence: 我已经拥有三台 (1 台 macbook pro) 并且它们都非常棒。

original_sentence: great little (1: machine) while it was functioning 100 % .
translated_sentence: 当它 100％ 运转时，它是一个很棒的小机器。

original_sentence: this little (2: computer) is very fast and does a great job .
translated_sentence: 这台小电脑运行速度非常快，而且性能非常好。

original_sentence: i am able to write , look up facts on the internet , and it has a pretty good (1: battery life) .
translated_sentence: 我可以写作、在互联网上查找事实，并且它的电池寿命也相当不错。

original_sentence: if you want to watch movies or listen to music , this might not be the (1: machine) for you .
translated_sentence: 如果您想看电影或听音乐，这可能不适合您。

original_sentence: the (2: machine) is easy to use , snappy , and everything the reviewers say .
translated_sentence: 该机器使用方便，反应灵敏，完全符合评论家的评价。

original_sentence: works great as a (1: chromebook) but (1: chromebook)s are still very limited for android compatibility , at least this one is .
translated_sentence: 作为 chromebook 来说效果很好，但是 chromebook 与 Android 的兼容性仍然非常有限，至少这一款是这样的。

original_sentence: the (2: keyboard) makes it easy to type notes quickly and write papers , and the backlit (2: keyboard) is a major plus .
translated_sentence: 键盘 可以轻松快速地输入笔记和撰写论文，并且背光（2：键盘）是一个很大的优点。
